name: Institute for Youth Participation, Health and Sustainable Development
memberOrga: We are an institute and by law we are not allowed to have members, only owners, employees and volunteers
goal:
The Institute for Youth Participation, Health and Sustainable Development (IMZTR) is a meeting point of three sectors (youth, public health and environmental) and supports an open dialogue with different stakeholders. IMZTR activities strive for positive social changes, developing the capabilities of public health, environmental and youth organizations and for personal development, especially for young people.

Employees and associates in IMZTR are highly competent, recognized individuals with many years of experiences in various sectors and advocates for the adoption and implementation of integrated public health, environmental and youth policies at all levels.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
EU Tobacco Directive
Alcohol and Health Forum
EU Health Policy Platform
Environment and Public Health Committee
